about.mainText: At OpenFly, we're passionate about using technology to make life better. Our team of developers and dreamers is working on:
about.weTrack: WeTrack: A cross-platform app for managing business and mood.
about.services: Services Ecosystem: A scalable network of services built with NestJS, Python, and Go.
about.point: üí° Our point: To create tools that inspire balance, connection, and personal growth through collaboration.
about.teamDesc: We are a small team of developers from Novosibirsk, Russia ‚Äî passionate enthusiasts from NSU and NSUEM.
about.servicesDesc: Full-stack and backend engineers who strive to build modern, reliable, and user-friendly services that make a real difference in people's lives.
about.love: Building the future from Siberia with love ‚ù§Ô∏è

stack.description: Our architecture is built for extreme scale and reliability, utilizing a federated microservice approach.
stack.gatewayDesc: NestJS + Fastify for high performance and low latency routing.
stack.authDesc: Secure Django implementation for SSO, OAuth2, and JWT.

pricing.tagline: Transparent plans for independent professionals and enterprises alike.

charity.tagline: Empowering citizens through synergy of technology and professional legal protection.

founder.name: Alexey O. Obmolov
founder.bio: Since 2015, Alexey has completed over 1,500 bankruptcy procedures, restoring financial stability to hundreds of families. He founded 'Plus Dobro' to provide legal aid not as a service, but as a vital social tool.

personal.title: Targeted Support
personal.desc: Full legal representation for citizens in difficult life situations, from consultation to court.

education.title: Legal Literacy
education.desc: Raising awareness and explaining complex legal issues in simple terms through modern media.

platform.title: Dokker Space Platform
platform.desc: Launching a free digital platform for people to generate legal documents independently.

success.title: Our Successes
